r.s: Tool to generate MySQL Pugins from an XML description
r.d: CodeGen_MySQL_Pluginis a code generator for MySQL Plugins extensions similar to PECL_Gen for PHP. It reads in configuration options, function prototypes and code fragments from an XML description file and generates a complete ready-to-compile plugin project.
r.n: Additions and changes since 0.9.1dev: - now supporting system variables (global and session) - misc. minor code generation fixes and improvements
